intro:
One button to play!
Jump and kill your enemies!
description:
Pixel Game Maker Series JETMAN is a simple jumping action game using only one button.

The height of the jump changes depending on the length of the button hold.
Make the best jump attack according to the enemy's position.

●More than 50 types of enemies!
There are many enemies with unique appearances and movements.
Identify their characteristics and attack them efficiently.

●Collect JP (=Junk Points) to strengthen your character!
You can strengthen your character by spending the points you earn in battle.
Strengthen your attack or your defense?
It is up to you to decide which you want to prioritize.

●Characters and stories that color the world
Jet, a half-android created by Dr. Arc to stop the ambitions of the evil organization Violet.
The story revolving around Jet will liven up the gameplay.

●Fun after clearing the game
A dedicated mode that becomes available after clearing the main game.
Enjoy "JETMAN" to the fullest!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on Nintendo Switch™.
